attributes.action: Let cancer patients have the surgery/treatment they need
attributes.additional_details:
Basically COVID patients are getting priority over cancer patients when the survival rate is much lower on a lot of cancers. Let those who need surgery for survival have a fair chance to do so! 
STAND UP FOR CANCER- SIGN THIS PETITION
attributes.background: All surgery for cancer patients has been cancelled by the trust, with so many people affected by this horrible disease I am asking for your help to get this to parliament

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552734

We can't accept petitions calling for changes to how individual NHS trusts make decisions about prioritising medical treatment, as this is matter for individual NHS trusts, not the Government or House of Commons.
